name: Market Gangster Fighting
description:
Be the best gangster in town! Run for your survival in this crazy supermarket games. Use your skills to develop a plan and manipulate to escape in the best possible way after performing a crime.

Features:
• Use weapons for robberies, brutal attacking & to kill
• Dedicated stunt simulation games
• Attack shop owners and innocent citizens
• Gaurds vs robbers chase adventure missions
• Visually attractive 3D supermarket environment
• Smooth & simple controls
